com.parkingtycoon.views

Class SpriteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.views.BaseView
      • com.parkingtycoon.views.SpriteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedSpriteView, ArrowView, ElevatorBackgroundView

    public class SpriteView
extends BaseView
    The SpriteView can render a static image to the screen on any position
